alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Chowan; Gates; Hertford; Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 28 at 10:14AM EDT until March 28 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR PORTIONS OF INTERIOR NORTHEAST NORTH CAROLINA... The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a Red Flag Warning for portions of interior northeast North Carolina, which is in effect from 2 PM this afternoon to 8 PM EDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 012 Northampton, Fire Weather Zone 013 Hertford, Fire Weather Zone 014 Gates, Fire Weather Zone 030 Bertie and Fire Weather Zone 031 Chowan. * TIMING... * WINDS...West to northwest winds 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...15 to 25 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the lower to mid 50s. * IMPACTS...Critical fire weather conditions are likely to develop today, especially from the mid afternoon through the early evening hours. All outdoor burning is discouraged.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
